articles.title: Show HN: Generate Next.js/React Tailwind blocks from a screenshots
articles.description:
Hey everyone!

Iâ€™ve been building side projects alongside my full-time job, and itâ€™s always been difficult to find time â€” especially when I had to build the UI from scratch every time. So thatâ€™s why I built Rapid-UI: to help myself and other founders generate Tailwind CSS blocks quickly and launch projects faster.

The goal is simple â€” spend less time on repetitive UI work, and more time bringing ideas to life. Iâ€™d love your feedback! (Iâ€™m shipping fresh blocks every day to expand the library.)

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45153284

Points: 1

# Comments: 0
